div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1168 Asia Minor, western, c. 1962 Burial: c. 500-490 B.C. (Pfeiler) Contents: c. 200 AR (fr.) Cyzicus: 1 Ephesus: 2 Magnesia?: "hundreds" Miletus: c. 40 Unc. mints: 4 Disposition: Athens 9 Varoucha, A Delt 1963 B p. 7, illus. Welz, SM 1965, pp. 1-2 Pfeiler, SNR 1966, pp. 12-4 Varoucha's no. 3, a coin from Magnesia, has been excluded because it is much later than the rest and presumably belongs to another hd., no. 1183 below
